trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_000<tab>That tome...that wouldn't happen to be a sightseeing log, would it?
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_001<tab>Millith! Now that's a name I haven't heard in a good long time. And dearest Elsebee...
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_002<tab>She's my twin sister, you see, and I haven't seen her for thirty long years. Not since I was trapped during my exploration of Yyasulani.
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_003<tab>It brings me great joy to know she is well. Pardon me for asking, but...might I see the notes she added to your log?
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_100_004<tab>She always did make such bold strokes of her lettering... Here.
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_005<tab>I've added my own notes. Some of the information may seem improbable at best, but I believe there is truth in every entry.
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_006<tab>Were I younger, I would set out in search of these fantastic sights myself, but alas, my body can no longer endure such travels.

TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_007<tab>Though thanks to you, I feel lighter than I have in an age. If there is one thing I should wish, it is to see my sister again before I die. There is so much I would share with her...

TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_000_008<tab>But you have better things to attend to than an old woman's musings. Take care, kind adventurer. And may your journey lead you to vistas both bright and unforgettable.
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_SYSTEM_000_009<tab>New Dawntrail entries have been added to your sightseeing log!
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_EMELINEIRONHEART_100_020<tab>You wouldn't happen to know any experienced explorers, would you? I'm looking for someone to seek what vistas I cannot...
TEXT_KINGYR105_05007_SYSTEM_100_021<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be level 90 or above.
